1.0.name: wordpress/dynamicwp-running-rss
1.0.description:
DynamicWP Running RSS is a RSS feed reader plugin. This plugin will displays RSS feed on the bottom of your site as a running text and floating. The plugin uses Google’s Ajax Feed API to host the desired RSS feeds on Google’s servers, based Dynamic Drive script – gAjax RSS Feeds Displayer.

Features

  • Easy to install and use.
  • Uses Google Ajax Feed API to host/cache the desired RSS feeds, so you don’t have to install or host anything on your own server.
  • Specify multiple RSS feeds to display, with the results intermixed.
  • Display as running text and floating.
  • Set the number of total RSS entries to show.

Demo

Please check the plugin demo page.

Credit

This plugin based gAjax RSS Feeds
